dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: 세 살 버릇 여든까지 간다이/가 뭐예요?
dialogue.romanization: se sal beoreut yeodeunkkaji gandai/ga mwoyeyo?
dialogue.translation: What is "세 살 버릇 여든까지 간다"?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: 세 살 버릇 여든까지 간다은/는 old habits die hard(이)에요.
dialogue.romanization: se sal beoreut yeodeunkkaji gandaeun/neun old habits die hard(i)eyo.
dialogue.translation: "세 살 버릇 여든까지 간다" means "old habits die hard".
